title: Practice-Based Entrepreneurial Learning Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Mobile learning optimization in technology-constrained environments, with practice-oriented design considering administrator/leader roles

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more practical problem-solving strategies through observation and experimentation in real-world startup scenarios.
Learners can improve collaborative efficiency by over 20% by interpreting peers' nonverbal cues through team projects and role-playing.
Learners can connect two or more practical cases using mobile-based collaboration tools and propose new value creation strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
